channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AstraZeneca makes deal with White House to lower drug prices
item.description: The U.K.-based drugmaker became the second to strike a deal with the Trump administration as part of the president's push to rein in U.S. drug prices.

item.title: Cops on Ketamine? Largely Unregulated Mental Health Treatment Faces Hurdles

item.title: As Trump Denies Climate Change, At Least 170 Hospitals Face Major Flood Risk
item.description: Get our weekly newsletter, The Week in Brief, featuring a roundup of our original coverage, Fridays at 2 p.m. ET.

item.title: 59% of Americans disapprove of RFK Jr.'s moves as health secretary, a new poll says
item.description: A new poll shows trust in federal health policies is plummeting, and what — or who — people believe increasingly depends on their politics.
